item.title:
‘MAMMA MIA!’ producer Judy Craymer says a third movie is in its “earliest stages.”
“There is a story there, and I do think Meryl should come back —— and if the script is right, she would, I think, because she really loved playing Donna.”
(https://deadline.com/2023/05/breaking-baz-itv-mamma-mia-i-have-a-dream-talent-show-judy-craymer-cher-1235351837/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Halle Bailey and Jonah Hauer-King have been announced as presenters at the 2023 MTV Movie & TV Awards on May 7.
